applications.title: SSD Partition Information
applications.arguments: -Command "& {$panelText = """$("""Drive""".PadRight(8))$("""Volume Name""".PadRight(17))$("""Size (GB)""".PadRight(12))$("""Free (GB)""".PadRight(12))`n"""; $panelText += """$(('-'*6).PadRight(8))$(('-'*15).PadRight(17))$(('-'*10).PadRight(12))$(('-'*10).PadRight(12))`n"""; get-wmiobject win32_logicaldisk | ForEach-Object { If ($_.VolumeName -ne $null) { $panelText += """$($_.Name.PadRight(8))$($_.VolumeName.PadRight(17))$([math]::round($_.size/1gb,2).ToString().PadRight(12))$([math]::round($_.freespace/1gb,2))`n""" } }; $panelText = $panelText.TrimEnd("""`n"""); Write-Host """$($panelText) `n `nInfo valid as of $(Get-Date -Format 'MM/dd/yy') at $(Get-Date -Format 'hh:mm:ss tt')."""}"

applications.title: IP Address Information
applications.arguments: -Command "& {Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; $panelText = """$("""IP Address""".PadRight(20))Interface`n$('-'*19) $('-'*27)`n"""; Get-NetIPAddress -AddressFamily IPV4 | Where-Object -FilterScript { $_.InterfaceAlias -notlike """*Loopback*""" } | Sort-Object -Property """InterfaceAlias""" | ForEach-Object { $panelText += """$($_.IPAddress.PadRight(20))$($_.InterfaceAlias)`n""" }; $panelText = $panelText.TrimEnd("""`n"""); Write-Host $panelText}"
